mapper.insert: insert into librarys(rki_no, book_nm_info, author_nm_info, publshcmpy_nm, publcatn_yy, id, state_cnt) values (#{rki_no}, #{book_nm_info}, #{author_nm_info}, #{publshcmpy_nm}, #{publcatn_yy}, #{id}, #{state_cnt})
mapper.select: select count(state_cnt) from librarys where rki_no = #{rki_no}
